fields.name: Subalignments:
fields.value: Killing, Support, Protective, Power, Investigative, Casual, Command, Nutrition, Evil, probably every other subalignment for all good factions? just not yet?

fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- 959: Cult Leader and at least one other Cult member will always spawn 
- Factional chat
- No factional kill 
- Town members converted to the Cult become Cult roles based on their alignment.
- If the Cult Leader dies, the most recently converted member, or the member with the lowest player number, will be promoted to Cult Leader.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate the Town and all other rival factions.

meta.inherit_fields: Goal:Eliminate the Town and all other rival factions.
